about_preview.label: The Maker
about_preview.text: Yusei is a small leather studio based in Japan, focused on creating objects that improve with time. Each piece is handcrafted from full-grain vegetable-tanned leather, saddle-stitched by hand, and made to order.

about.label: About Yusei
about.title: Built to Age
about.story_p1: Yusei began in a small workshop with a single belief: the things we carry should outlast us. Founded on the principles of Japanese craftsmanship, every piece is made with patience, precision, and respect for material.
about.story_p2: The name Yusei (勇誠) reflects our philosophy — courage and sincerity in every stitch. We don't rush. We don't cut corners. We let the leather speak.
about.philosophy_p1: We believe in slow making. In an age of disposable goods, we choose to create objects that develop character over years of use.
about.philosophy_p2: Full-grain leather is a living material. It remembers every touch, every journey, every moment. Our role is simply to shape it well and let time do the rest.
about.quote: "The best leather goods are not the ones that look new forever — they are the ones that look better with every passing year."

materials.label: Materials & Craft
materials.title: Understanding the Craft
materials.intro: Premium pricing reflects premium materials and irreplaceable technique. Here is why every detail matters.
materials.leather_p1: Full-grain is the strongest, most durable grade of leather. It uses the entire outer surface of the hide — including all natural grain patterns, scars, and markings that make each piece unique.
materials.leather_p2: Unlike corrected-grain or bonded leather, full-grain develops a rich patina over time, becoming more beautiful with age rather than deteriorating.
materials.tanning_p1: Our leather is vegetable-tanned using natural tree bark extracts — a process that takes weeks rather than the hours required by chrome tanning. The result is a firmer, more characterful leather that ages gracefully.
materials.tanning_p2: Vegetable-tanned leather is environmentally gentler and produces earth-tone colors that deepen naturally over time.
materials.patina_p1: Patina is the gradual darkening and softening of leather through handling, sunlight, and natural oils. It is the signature of genuine, well-used leather.
materials.patina_p2: Each piece begins lighter and develops its own unique character. No two pieces age the same way — your leather becomes truly yours.
materials.stitch_p1: Unlike machine stitching which uses a single thread in a chain pattern, saddle-stitching uses two needles passing through the same hole in opposite directions.
materials.stitch_p2: If one stitch breaks, the surrounding stitches hold fast. Machine stitching unravels. This is slower — but it lasts a lifetime.
materials.edge_p1: Every edge is burnished by hand using multiple rounds of sanding, application of gum tragacanth, and heat burnishing. The result is a smooth, sealed edge that resists moisture and wear.
materials.hardware_p1: We use solid brass hardware — buckles, rivets, and clasps that develop their own patina alongside the leather. No plated metals. No plastic components.
materials.care_p1: Full-grain leather requires minimal care. Keep it dry, avoid prolonged direct sunlight, and condition occasionally with a quality leather balm. Allow dust and dirt to be wiped away with a soft cloth.
materials.care_p2: Do not use chemical cleaners or waterproofing sprays. The leather will naturally develop water resistance over time.

shipping.label: Shipping & FAQ
shipping.title: Shipping & Policies
shipping.production_text: Standard production takes 14–30 days depending on the piece. We will provide an estimated completion date at the time of your quote.
shipping.shipping_text: We ship worldwide via tracked express courier. Delivery typically takes 3–7 business days after dispatch. Shipping costs are calculated based on destination and package weight.
shipping.customs_text: International orders may be subject to customs duties and import taxes. These charges are the responsibility of the buyer and vary by country.
shipping.tracking_text: A tracking number is provided once your order ships. We will send updates at each stage of the delivery process.
shipping.delays_text: If a delay occurs during production or shipping, we will notify you promptly and provide a revised timeline. We do not compromise quality for speed.
shipping.returns_text: Due to the custom nature of our work, we do not accept returns on made-to-order pieces. If you receive a defective item, please contact us within 7 days of delivery.
